reviewtext: I use the cable at home on my home desktop PC.  It's great for synchronizing my Palm IIIxe with my home and work PC.  I use avantgo.com at home to add news to my Palm (which I can't do at work).Best of all it is cheaper then the cradle and it does the exact same thing.  The only thing missing is the button that you get on the cradle.  Instead, you launch HotSync from your Palm.
summary: Works well and cheaper than a HotSync Cradle!!
